mapper.select: SELECT us.userName AS userName, us.userIdCard AS userIdCard, us.userGender AS userGender, c.certificateNumber AS certificateNumber, co.courseName AS courseName, co.acquisitionTime AS acquisitionTime, co.finishTime AS finishTime FROM user_course uc JOIN user us ON uc.userId = us.id JOIN course co ON uc.courseId = co.id JOIN certificate c ON c.gainUserId = us.id WHERE uc.id = #{query.userCourseId} AND c.id = #{query.certificateId} AND uc.userId = c.gainUserId AND co.userId = uc.userId;
